cast.name: 桑德拉·罗德斯 Zandra Rhodes
罗伯特·普兰特 Robert Plant
罗杰·达尔特雷 Roger Daltrey
蒙茨克拉特·卡巴耶 Montserrat Caballé

trans_title: 弗莱迪·默克里：不为人知的故事
introduction: The Lover of Life, Singer of Songs Double DVD features a variety of unseen footage, including clips, promo videos, live performances, 'The Untold Story' documentary, the last recorded interview with Freddie as well as special bonus commentaries and much much more.DVD1 - The Untold StoryFreddie Mercury - The Untold Story [Documentary]The Making Of - The Untold StoryDVD2 - Singer of SongsThe Solo Videos (all presented in 5.1 DTS Surround Sound):• Barcelona• The Great Pretender• I Was Born To Love You• Time• How Can I Go On• Made In Heaven• Living On My Own• The Golden BoyBonus Videos :• Barcelona (Live Version)• The Great Pretender (Extended Version)• In My Defence (Re-edit 2000)Extras :• Freddie Mercury Audio Commentary - Taken from archive audio interviews – talking in detail about the specific songs, and recording as a solo artist.• Video Directors Audio Commentary – Each video is accompanied by a detailed explanation by the video’s Director.• A View Forever – Short documentary describing the creation and unveiling of the Freddie statue in Montreux. Includes interview with the sculptor.• Interactive Photo Gallery – Highlights from the Freddie Mercury Photo Exhibition accompanied by Thierry Lang performance of Freddie songs.抱歉，给的IMDB是以前TV版的，这张06年发行的2DVD盒装由于含有一张音乐录影带，所以不能算作电影，或许以后IMDB上会有介绍
chinese_title: 弗莱迪·默克里：不为人知的故事
